text: little bit of breaking news now from
Italy you may be aware that we've been
telling you about the earthquake that
happened on the island of Ischia just
off the coast of Naples it happened at 9
o'clock yesterday evening we have
already seen television pictures of a
seven month old child being pulled alive
successfully from the rubble well now
more good news one person has died in
that but there are people being pulled
alive as we speak that 7 month old baby
Kestrel was pulled alive through the
night then a seven-month seven-year-old
brother Mattias and now the 11 year old
brother of both of those they have
managed to pull the last child free from
the rubble after that magnitude 4
earthquake which toppled two people so
three children pulled alive from the
rubble three children from
